com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartsync.manager

Class CacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartsync.manager.CacheManager

  • public class CacheManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides APIs to store and retrieve Salesforce object metadata, object layouts and MRU objects from a simple cache.
    Author:
    bhariharan

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CacheManager.CachePolicy
      This enum defines different possible cache policies.

        Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • removeCache

        public void removeCache(java.lang.String cacheType,
                        java.lang.String cacheKey)
        Removes existing data from the specified cache.
        Parameters:
        cacheType - Cache type.
        cacheKey - Cache key.

      • needToReloadCache

        public boolean needToReloadCache(boolean cacheExists,
                                 CacheManager.CachePolicy cachePolicy,
                                 long lastCachedTime,
                                 long refreshIfOlderThan)
        Returns whether the cache needs to be refreshed. Before this method is called, either 'doesCacheExist', or 'lastCacheUpdateTime' should be called to determine whether the cache already exists and the last update time of the cache.
        Parameters:
        cacheExists - True - if the cache exists, False - otherwise.
        cachePolicy - Cache policy being used.
        lastCachedTime - Last time the cache was updated.
        refreshIfOlderThan - Refresh time interval. A negative value will result in the cache not being refreshed.
        Returns:
        True - if cache needs to be refreshed, False - otherwise.

      • getLastCacheUpdateTime

        public long getLastCacheUpdateTime(java.lang.String cacheType,
                                   java.lang.String cacheKey)
        Returns the last time the cache was refreshed.
        Parameters:
        cacheType - Cache type.
        cacheKey - Cache key.
        Returns:
        Last update time of the cache.
